chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall E : Ens, depprod1 Ens (fun L : Ens => Ord L /\ IN E (Vee L))

Premises:
depprod1 : forall A : Type, (A -> Type) -> Type
IN = fun E1 E2 : Ens => match E2 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ E1 (f y)) end : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
Ord = fun E : Ens => ord E E (INC_refl E) : Ens -> Prop
Vee = fix Vee (E : Ens) : Ens := match E with | sup A f => Union (sup A (fun a : A => Power (Vee (f a)))) end : Ens -> Ens
Inductive Ens : Type := sup : forall A : Type, (A -> Ens) -> Ens Arguments sup _%type_scope _%function_scope
INC_IN_Vee_Succ : forall E L : Ens, Ord L -> INC E (Vee L) -> IN E (Vee (Succ L))
IN_Vee_Succ_EXType : forall E X : Ens, Ord E -> IN X (Vee (Succ E)) -> EXType Ens (fun Y : Ens => INC Y E /\ Ord Y /\ INC X (Vee Y))
IN_Vee_EXType : forall E X : Ens, IN X (Vee E) -> EXType Ens (fun Y : Ens => IN Y E /\ INC X (Vee Y))
Union_IN : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Union E) -> EXType Ens (fun E1 : Ens => IN E1 E /\ IN E' E1)
Inter' = fun E : Ens => Comp (Union E) (fun e : Ens => forall a : Ens, IN a E -> IN e a) : Ens -> Ens
INC = fun E1 E2 : Ens => forall E : Ens, IN E E1 -> IN E E2 : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
IN_Vee_Succ : forall E X : Ens, Ord E -> forall Y : Ens, Ord Y -> INC Y E -> INC X (Vee Y) -> IN X (Vee (Succ E))
Paire = fun E E' : Ens => sup bool (fun H : bool => bool_rect (fun _ : bool => Ens) E E' H) : Ens -> Ens -> Ens
Succ = fun E : Ens => Comp (Power E) Ord : Ens -> Ens
EQ = fun X : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Ens -> Prop) (fun (A : Type) (_ : A -> Ens) (eq1 : A -> Ens -> Prop) (X0 : Ens) => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Prop) (fun (B : Type) (g : B -> Ens) (_ : B -> Prop) => (forall x : A, EXType B (fun y : B => eq1 x (g y))) /\ (forall y : B, EXType A (fun x : A => eq1 x (g y)))) X0) X : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
IN_Vee : forall V W : Ens, IN W V -> forall E : Ens, INC E (Vee W) -> IN E (Vee V)
Union = fun E : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Ens) (fun (A : Type) (f _ : A -> Ens) => sup (depprod A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x))) (fun X : depprod A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) => depprod_rect A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) (fun _ : depprod A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) => Ens) (fun (a : A) (b : pi1 (f a)) => pi2 (f a) b) X)) E : Ens -> Ens
Inter = fun E : Ens => match E with | sup A f => sup (depprod A (fun a : A => depprod (pi1 (f a)) (fun b : pi1 (f a) => forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x)))) (fun c : depprod A (fun a : A => depprod (pi1 (f a)) (fun b : pi1 (f a) => forall x : A, IN (pi2 (f a) b) (f x))) => match c with | @dep_i _ _ a (@dep_i _ _ b _) => pi2 (f a) b end) end : Ens -> Ens
Sing = fun E : Ens => Paire E E : Ens -> Ens
Power = fun E : Ens => match E with | sup A f => sup (A -> Prop) (fun P : A -> Prop => sup (depprod A (fun a : A => P a)) (fun c : depprod A (fun a : A => P a) => match c with | @dep_i _ _ a _ => f a end)) end : Ens -> Ens
plump : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> forall E1 E2 : Ens, Ord E1 -> Ord E2 -> IN E1 E -> INC E2 E1 -> IN E2 E
Class_succ = fun E : Ens => Union (Paire E (Sing E)) : Ens -> Ens
IN_Ord_Ord : forall E E' : Ens, Ord E -> IN E' E -> Ord E'
pi2 : forall E : Ens, pi1 E -> Ens
pi1 = fun X : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Type) (fun (A : Type) (_ : A -> Ens) (_ : A -> Type) => A) X : Ens -> Type
Ord_intro : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> Ord E') -> (forall E1 E2 : Ens, Ord E1 -> Ord E2 -> IN E1 E -> INC E2 E1 -> IN E2 E) -> Ord E
Union_Ord : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> Ord E') -> Ord (Union E)
Inter_Ord : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> Ord E') -> Ord (Inter E)
Ord_trans : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> INC E' E
Succ_incr : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> IN E (Succ E)
Comp = fun X : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => (Ens -> Prop) -> Ens) (fun (A : Type) (f : A -> Ens) (_ : A -> (Ens -> Prop) -> Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop) => sup (sig A (fun x : A => P (f x))) (fun X0 : sig A (fun x : A => P (f x)) => sig_rect A (fun x : A => P (f x)) (fun _ : sig A (fun x : A => P (f x)) => Ens) (fun (x : A) (_ : P (f x)) => f x) X0)) X : Ens -> (Ens -> Prop) -> Ens Arguments Comp _ _%function_scope
IN_Omega_EXType : forall E : Ens, IN E Omega -> EXType nat (fun n : nat => EQ (Nat n) E)
IN_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a))
Vide = sup F (fun f : F => match f return Ens with end) : Ens
union_Ord : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> Ord (Union E)
Ord_Succ : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> Ord (Succ E)
inter_ord : forall E : Ens, Ord E -> Ord (Inter E)
Ord_sound : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> Ord E -> Ord E'
Comp_INC : forall (E : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), INC (Comp E P) E
IN_P_Comp : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A E -> P A -> IN A (Comp E P)
IN_Nat_EXType : forall (n : nat) (E : Ens), IN E (Nat n) -> EXType nat (fun p : nat => EQ E (Nat p))
Nat = fun H : nat => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => Ens) Vide (fun (_ : nat) (X : Ens) => Class_succ X) H : nat -> Ens Arguments Nat _%nat_scope
EQ_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> forall a : pi1 E, EXType (pi1 E') (fun b : pi1 E' => EQ (pi2 E a) (pi2 E' b))
IN_Comp_P : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A (Comp E P) -> P A
IN_Inter_all : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Inter E) -> forall E'' : Ens, IN E'' E -> IN E' E''

``` 
intros E. apply Ind. intros L [H1 H2]. split.
- exact H1.
- apply INC_IN_Vee_Succ. apply H2.
```

original: intros E. apply Ind. intros L [H1 H2]. split. - apply H1. - apply INC_IN_Vee_Succ. apply H2.
